players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. Diana was killed last night and I investigated Alice. My investigation revealed Alice is the mafioso."
You: "Charlie, you're lying! I'm not the mafioso—maybe you're trying to frame me as the detective. Let's not rush to vote."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. Diana was killed last night and I investigated Alice. My investigation revealed Alice is the mafioso."
